name: גאודיף מטלה 8 שאלה 4
body:
### סעיף א'
$\alpha=\alpha_1dx^1+\alpha_2dx^2+\alpha_3dx^3\in \Omega_1(\RR^3)$, $F_\alpha:=(\alpha_1,\alpha_2,\alpha_3): \RR^3\to \RR^3$.
$f\in \Omega^0(\RR^3)=C^\infty(\RR^3)$.
**מ.ש.ל.** $F_{df}=\nabla f$.
_הוכחה._ $f$ חלקה ($0$-תבנית דיפרנציאלית), לכן $df$ זה הדיפרנציאל הרגיל, כלומר
$$df=\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_1}dx^1+\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_2}dx^2+\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_3}dx^3$$
ולכן
$$F_{df}=\left(\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_1},\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_2},\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_3}\right)=\nabla f$$
כנדרש. $\square$

### סעיף ב'
$\beta=\beta_1dx^2\wedge dx^3+\beta_2 dx^3\wedge dx^1+\beta_3 dx^1\wedge dx^2\in \Omega^2(\RR^3)$, $F_{\beta}:=(\beta_1,\beta_2,\beta_3): \RR^3\to \RR^3$
$\alpha=\alpha_1dx^1+\alpha_2dx^2+\alpha_3dx^3\in \Omega_1(\RR^3)$
**מ.ש.ל.** $F_{d\alpha}=\operatorname*{curl}F_{\alpha}$.
_הוכחה._ מתקיים 
$$d\alpha=d(\alpha_1dx^1)+d(\alpha_2dx^2)+d(\alpha_3dx^3)=d\alpha_1\wedge dx^1+d\alpha_2\wedge dx^2+d\alpha_3\wedge dx^4$$
נחשב את המחוברים:
$$\begin{aligned}
d\alpha_1\wedge dx_1&=\left(\frac{\partial\alpha_1}{\partial x_1}dx^1+\frac{\partial\alpha_1}{\partial x_2}dx^2+\frac{\partial\alpha_1}{\partial x_3}dx^3\right)\wedge dx^1 \\
&=-\frac{\partial\alpha_1}{\partial x_2}dx^1\wedge dx^2+\frac{\partial\alpha_1}{\partial x_3}dx^3\wedge dx^1
\end{aligned}$$
ובאופן דומה
$$\begin{aligned}
&d\alpha_2\wedge dx^2=\frac{\partial\alpha_2}{\partial x_1}dx^1\wedge dx^2-\frac{\partial\alpha_2}{\partial x_3}dx^2\wedge dx^3 \\
&d\alpha_3\wedge dx^3=-\frac{\partial\alpha_3}{\partial x_1}dx^3\wedge dx^1+\frac{\partial\alpha_3}{\partial x_2}dx^2\wedge dx^3
\end{aligned}$$
יחד נקבל
$$d\alpha=\left(\frac{\partial\alpha_3}{\partial x_2}-\frac{\partial \alpha_2}{\partial x_3}\right)dx^2\wedge dx^3
+\left(\frac{\partial\alpha_1}{\partial x_3}-\frac{\partial \alpha_3}{\partial x_1}\right)dx^3\wedge dx^1
+\left(\frac{\partial\alpha_2}{\partial x_1}-\frac{\partial \alpha_1}{\partial x_2}\right)dx^1\wedge dx^2$$
ולכן
$$F_{d\alpha}=\left(\frac{\partial\alpha_3}{\partial x_2}-\frac{\partial \alpha_2}{\partial x_3},\frac{\partial\alpha_1}{\partial x_3}-\frac{\partial \alpha_3}{\partial x_1},\frac{\partial\alpha_2}{\partial x_1}-\frac{\partial \alpha_1}{\partial x_2}\right)=\operatorname*{curl}F_\alpha$$
כנדרש. $\square$

### סעיף ג'
$\gamma=\gamma_1dx^1\wedge dx^2\wedge dx^3$, $F_\gamma=\gamma_1: \RR^3\to \RR$
$\beta=\beta_1dx^2\wedge dx^3+\beta_2 dx^3\wedge dx^1+\beta_3 dx^1\wedge dx^2$
**מ.ש.ל.** $F_{d\beta}=\operatorname*{div}F_\beta$
_הוכחה._ נרשום
$$d\beta=d(\beta_1dx^2\wedge dx^3)+d(\beta_2 dx^3\wedge dx^1)+d(\beta_3 dx^1\wedge dx^2)$$
נחשב את המחוברים:
$$\begin{aligned}
d(\beta_1dx^2\wedge dx^3)&=\left(\frac{\partial \beta_1}{\partial x_1}dx^1+\frac{\partial \beta_1}{\partial x_2}dx^2+\frac{\partial \beta_1}{\partial x_3}dx^3\right)\wedge dx^2\wedge dx^3 \\
&=\frac{\partial \beta_1}{\partial x_1}dx^1\wedge dx^2\wedge dx^3
\end{aligned}$$
באופן דומה 
$$\begin{aligned}
&d(\beta_2dx^3\wedge dx^1)=\frac{\partial \beta_2}{\partial x_1}dx^1\wedge dx^2\wedge dx^3 \\
&d(\beta_3dx^1\wedge dx^2)=\frac{\partial \beta_3}{\partial x_1}dx^1\wedge dx^2\wedge dx^3 \\
\end{aligned}$$
לכן
$$d\beta=\left(\frac{\partial \beta_1}{\partial x_1}+\frac{\partial \beta_2}{\partial x_2}+\frac{\partial \beta_3}{\partial x_3}\right)dx^1\wedge dx^2\wedge dx^3$$
כלומר
$$F_{d\beta}=\frac{\partial \beta_1}{\partial x_1}+\frac{\partial \beta_2}{\partial x_2}+\frac{\partial \beta_3}{\partial x_3}=\operatorname*{div}F_\beta$$
כנדרש. $\square$
